title: Dirty blast

properties.name: description
properties.value: A dirty blast is a drink used in the first subquest of Recipe for Disaster. It is made by adding ashes to a player-made fruit blast, requiring 10 Cooking. The fruit blast obtained from The Dig Site quest can also be used - however, its pre-made counterpart obtained from Blurberry Bar will NOT work to make it. Additionally, you cannot add the ashes until after the quest begins. Creating a dirty blast gives 5 Cooking experience.

Dirty blast

Item ID7497

A dirty blast is a drink used in the first subquest of Recipe for Disaster. It is made by adding ashes to a player-made fruit blast, requiring 10 Cooking. The fruit blast obtained from The Dig Site quest can also be used - however, its pre-made counterpart obtained from Blurberry Bar will NOT work to make it. Additionally, you cannot add the ashes until after the quest begins. Creating a dirty blast gives 5 Cooking experience.

It is needed along with a Rotten tomato, an Eye of newt, and a Greenman's ale for the Recipe for Disaster quest as part of a powerful food-magic (as explained by the Gypsy) wherein the Lumbridge cook inadvertently revives the Culinaromancer.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When mixing a dirty blast, the player will say "This looks disgusting, but it's what the cook asked for."
  • The dirty blast, despite having a drink option, cannot be drunk nor emptied and is useless after the quest.

It is made by adding [[ashes]] to a ''player-made'' [[fruit blast]], requiring 10 [[Cooking]]. The fruit blast obtained from [[The Dig Site]] quest can also be used - however, its [[premade fr' blast|pre-made counterpart]] obtained from [[Blurberry Bar]] will '''NOT''' work to make it. Additionally, you cannot add the ashes until after the quest begins. Creating a dirty blast gives 5 Cooking experience. It is needed along with a [[Rotten tomato]], an [[Eye of newt]], and a [[Greenman's ale]] for the [[Recipe for Disaster]] quest as part of a powerful food-magic (as explained by the [[Gypsy]]) wherein the [[Lumbridge cook]] inadvertently revives the [[Culinaromancer]]. ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Cooking |skill1lvl = 10 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 5 |members = Yes |ticks = 1 |mat1 = Fruit blast |mat2 = Ashes |output1 = Dirty blast |output1cost = No }} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |daterange = 28 November -
